title: Christmas parties row: Three gatherings to be investigated by top civil servant
content:
1. Christmas parties row: Three gatherings to be investigated by top civil servant  BBC News
  2. Live: Tory minister grilled by MPs on No 10 parties  The Independent
  3. Boris Johnson faces grilling amid Christmas party scandal  CNN
  4. Will the furore over the No 10 party be enough to burst Boris Johnson’s bubble?  The Guardian
  5. Allegra Stratton did the right thing by quitting – now Boris Johnson’s job could be on the line  The Independent
contentSnippet:

localize.title: クリスマス・パーティ問題 3つのパーティの調査を公務員が担当
